explains: n. 纳瓦霍人（美国最大的印第安部落）

sentences.en: Navajo is hard to learn and only a few people know it.
sentences.cn: 纳瓦霍语很难学，只有少数人知道。

sentences.en: They were called the Navajo code talkers.
sentences.cn: 他们被称为纳瓦霍密码破解员。

sentences.en: It was a spoken code, never written down, and it was developed and used by Navajo Indians.
sentences.cn: 它是一种口头的密码，从来没有写下来，是纳瓦霍印第安人发明和使用的。
